CustomField.description: This field has been created for User story CLAIMS-59. When the goodwill amount is submitted for approval, the US Sales hierarchy requires that if the goodwill amount is greater than $25000, the 2nd level approval from the VP Sales should be auto-approved. The purpose of this field is to verify if the US Account Director has approved the goodwill amount at level 1. This field shall be hidden to all other profiles except the System Admin
CustomField.label: SYS Has US Account Director Approved
